Hello,

The plot is going fine and well - really well actually. :)

 However Since I haven't heard from Sandy in a day or so, I am going
to give Sandy time to catch up. It can be crazy to come back and too
much has happened. Also Sandy's characters have a stake in all of this
:)

Preston
